          Configuring Slider Settings

          Instructions to configure the slider of the themes.

          To configure functionality and design of the homepage slider

          • Go to:

            For all theme versions For PRO theme options only
            Appearance > Customize Appearance > Theme Options
          • When the menu opens, select Slider.
          • Click Slider – General to configure the following options:
          Option Description
          Specify where slider should be shown drop-down list Specify where to show the slider. You can hide the slider by selecting the corresponding action.
          Disable slider on mobile checkbox Disable slider for mobile devices.
          Slider Height box Enter the height if the slider (in pixels).
          Animation Speed box Enter the time of the animation (in miliseconds).
          Pause Time box Enter the time interval between image transitions (in milisecods).
          Stop animation while hovering checkbox Stop animation while hovering over the slider.
          Effect drop-down list Choose slider animation effect.
          Title Position drop-down list Choose the position for the slider title.
          Description Positiondrop-down list Choose the position for the slider description.
          • Click Slider – Images to configure the following options:
          Option Description
          Image URL box Enter the URL of the slider image.
          Update image button Update the slider image. You may add the image from computer, URL or Media Library.
          Remove this slide button Remove the slide from the slider.
          Image Href box Specify the URL of the page the image goes to.
          Image Title box Enter the image title.
          Image Description box Enter the image description.
          Add new slide button Add new slide to the slider. You may add the image from computer, URL or Media Library.
          • Click the Save & Publish button to save your changes.
